verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Behold,<WH7200> I have made<WH5414> you as God<WH430> to Pharaoh;<WH6547> and Aaron<WH175> your brother<WH251> shall be your prophet.<WH5030>

You shall speak<WH1696> all that I command<WH6680> you;<WH175> and Aaron your brother<WH251> shall speak<WH1696> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> that he let<WH7971> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go out of his land.<WH776>
I will harden<WH7185> Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart,<WH3820> and multiply<WH7235> my signs<WH226> and my wonders<WH4159> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

But Pharaoh<WH6547> will not listen<WH8085> to you,<WH5414> and I will lay my hand<WH3027> on Egypt,<WH4714> and bring out<WH3318> my armies,<WH6635> my people<WH5971> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> by great<WH1419> judgments.<WH8201>

The Egyptians<WH4714> shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I stretch out<WH5186> my hand<WH3027> on Egypt,<WH4714> and bring out<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from among them.<WH8432>"
Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> so.<WH3068> As Yahweh commanded<WH6680> them,<WH6213> so they did.
Moses<WH4872> was eighty<WH8084> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> eighty<WH8084>- three<WH7969> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> when they spoke<WH1696> to Pharaoh.<WH6547>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"When Pharaoh<WH6547> speaks<WH1696> to you,<WH559> saying, <WH5414> 'Perform a miracle!<WH4159>' then you shall tell<WH559> Aaron,<WH175> <WH3947> 'Take your rod,<WH4294> and cast<WH7993> it down before<WH6440> Pharaoh,<WH6547> that it become a serpent.<WH8577>'"

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went in<WH935> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and they did<WH6213> so,<WH3068> as Yahweh had commanded:<WH6680> and Aaron<WH175> cast down<WH7993> his rod<WH4294> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547> and before<WH6440> his servants,<WH5650> and it became a serpent.<WH8577>

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> also called<WH7121> for the wise men<WH2450> and the sorcerers.<WH3784> They also,<WH2748> the magicians of Egypt,<WH4714> did<WH6213> the same thing<WH3651> with their enchantments.<WH3858>
For they each<WH376> cast down<WH7993> their rods,<WH4294> and they became serpents:<WH8577> but Aaron<WH175>'s rod<WH4294> swallowed up<WH1104> their rods.<WH4294>
Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart<WH3820> was hardened,<WH2388> and he didn't<WH8085> listen to them;<WH3068> as Yahweh had spoken.<WH1696>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart<WH3820> is stubborn.<WH3515> He refuses<WH3985> to let the people<WH5971> go.<WH7971>

Go to Pharaoh<WH6547> in the morning.<WH1242> Behold,<WH3318> he goes out to the water;<WH4325> and you shall stand<WH5324> by the river<WH2975>'s bank<WH8193> to meet<WH7125> him;<WH4294> and the rod which was turned<WH2015> to a serpent<WH5175> you shall take<WH3947> in your hand.<WH3027>

You shall tell<WH559> him,<WH3068> 'Yahweh, the God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> has sent<WH7971> me to you,<WH559> saying, "Let my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me in the wilderness:<WH4057>" and behold,<WH8085> until now you haven't listened.

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "In this you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068> Behold,<WH5221> I will strike with the rod<WH4294> that is in my hand<WH3027> on the waters<WH4325> which are in the river,<WH2975> and they shall be turned<WH2015> to blood.<WH1818>

The fish<WH1710> that are in the river<WH2975> shall die,<WH4191> and the river<WH2975> shall become foul;<WH887> and the Egyptians<WH4714> shall loathe<WH3811> to drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> from the river.<WH2975>"'"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Tell Aaron,<WH175> <WH3947> 'Take your rod,<WH4294> and stretch out<WH5186> your hand<WH3027> over the waters<WH4325> of Egypt,<WH4714> over their rivers,<WH2975> over their streams,<WH5104> and over their pools,<WH4723> and over all their ponds<WH98> of water,<WH4325> that they may become blood;<WH1818> and there shall be blood<WH1818> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both in vessels of wood<WH6086> and in vessels of stone.<WH68>'"

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> so,<WH3068> as Yahweh commanded;<WH6680> and he lifted up<WH7311> the rod,<WH4294> and struck<WH5221> the waters<WH4325> that were in the river,<WH2975> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and in the sight<WH5869> of his servants;<WH5650> and all the waters<WH4325> that were in the river<WH2975> were turned<WH2015> to blood.<WH1818>

The fish<WH1710> that were in the river<WH2975> died;<WH4191> and the river<WH2975> became foul,<WH887> and the Egyptians<WH4714> couldn't<WH3201> drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> from the river;<WH2975> and the blood<WH1818> was throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

The magicians<WH2748> of Egypt<WH4714> did<WH6213> the same thing with their enchantments;<WH3909> and Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart<WH3820> was hardened,<WH2388> and he didn't<WH8085> listen to them;<WH3068> as Yahweh had spoken.<WH1696>
Pharaoh<WH6547> turned<WH6437> and went<WH935> into his house,<WH1004> and he didn't<WH7896> even take this<WH2063> to heart.<WH3820>
All the Egyptians<WH4714> dug<WH2658> around<WH5439> the river<WH2975> for water<WH4325> to drink;<WH8354> for they couldn't<WH3201> drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the river.<WH2975>
Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> were fulfilled,<WH4390> after<WH310> Yahweh<WH3068> had struck<WH5221> the river.<WH2975>
